body_html:
This looks like a problem with your installation of bazel.
Not really a TensorFlow issue.

Please make sure in the same terminal you are running ./configure, you can run bazel version.
You might need to add the location of bazel binary to your path.

Since this is a bazel installation issue, I am closing it. Please make sure to follow bazel installation documentation to make sure it is installed properly.

Since this is a bazel installation issue, I am closing it. Please make sure to follow bazel installation documentation to make sure it is installed properly.
body:
This looks like a problem with your installation of bazel.
Not really a TensorFlow issue.

Please make sure in the same terminal you are running `./configure`, you can run `bazel version`.
You might need to add the location of bazel binary to your path.

Since this is a bazel installation issue, I am closing it. Please make sure to follow bazel installation documentation to make sure it is installed properly.
